abstract: Apple announced its latest magical device on Tuesday, a Magic Trackpad designed to replace the traditional desktop mouse on Mac computers.
snippet: Apple announced its latest magical device on Tuesday, a Magic Trackpad designed to replace the traditional desktop mouse on Mac computers.
lead_paragraph: Over at the Gadgetwise blog, I wrote a post about Apple’s latest “magical” device: the Magic Trackpad, which is a mouse replacement that also offers full multitouch capabilities.

headline.main: Apple Brings (Magic) Multitouch to the Computer
